sentence.Network_en: If I was a hoodlum I could hit you on the head.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果我是强盗的话,我可以猛击你的头.

sentence.Network_en: The hoodlum is still in jug.
The hoodlum menaced the local merchants.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 这把暴徒(Hoodlum)是最终极的生存刀。结合了罗恩·胡德(Ron Hood)的设计和巴克的高质量生产标准，这把暴徒可以确保使用者在极 …
电影世界:十大传奇黑帮大盗 ... 《暴徒》（ Mobsters，1991） 《流氓》（ Hoodlum，1997） 《荡寇志》( Jesse James，1939).
混字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 混合物〖 composition〗 混混儿〖 hoodlum〗 混交〖 mixed〗.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(H3) ... hoodle 弹珠 hoodlum 强盗 hoodman 蒙眼人.

list.abs: the hoodlum is still in jug ., 那个恶棍仍在坐牢.
hoodlums stripped him of all his belongings .流氓夺走了他的所有财物。
the hoodlums defiled the church with scurrilous writing .这群无赖写了许多庸俗下流的东西，玷污了这座教堂。
The hoodlum menaced the local merchants ., 盗匪威胁着当地商人.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent. (originally US): of unknown origin

entry.def: A hoodlum is a violent criminal, especially one who is a member of a group.

means.word_mean: 1. an aggressive and violent young criminal

sentences.en: Dozens of police arrived as the hoodlums closed in on him.
sentences.cn: 几个恶棍逐渐将他团团围住时,几十个警察到了。
